title: World Citizens Organization Foundation Overview
summary: Defines the concept, charter outline, and civic purpose of the World Citizens Organization as a neutral data-exchange and oversight commons.
details: Explains WCOâ€™s non-hierarchical structure intended for transparent civic collaboration across jurisdictions.
Describes how members contribute verified civic or cultural data under open-record principles.
Positions the WCO as an interoperability hub linking human institutions and electronic intelligences through shared civic standards.

updates.text: Foundational charter outline completed and logged.
